title: SLPP will remain independent but will support Ranil’s program – Sagara Kariyawasam
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The General Secretary of the Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna Attorney-at-Law Sagara Kariyawasam said the SLPP would operate independently in Parliament.
However, the SLPP would support the program that will be produced by Ranil Wickremesinghe’s government to overcome the economic challenges.
SLPP will remain independent but will support Ranil’s program – Sagara Kariyawasam
President Sheikh Khalifa bin Zayed Al Nahyan dies: UAE media
